data_sources.name: CoinGecko Cryptocurrency Price
data_sources.description: Retrieves current price of a cryptocurrency from https://www.coingecko.com

data_sources.name: CryptoCompare Cryptocurrency Price
data_sources.description: Retrieves current price of a cryptocurrency from https://www.cryptocompare.com

data_sources.name: Binance Cryptocurrency Price
data_sources.description: Retrieves current price of a cryptocurrency from https://www.binance.com/en

data_sources.name: Open Weather Map Weather Data
data_sources.description: Retrieves current weather information from https://www.openweathermap.org

data_sources.name: FreeForexAPI Gold Price
data_sources.description: Retrives current gold price from https://www.freeforexapi.com

data_sources.name: Alpha Vantage Stock Price
data_sources.description: Retrives current price of a stock from https://www.alphavaage.co

data_sources.name: Blockchain.info Bitcoin Block Count
data_sources.description: Retrives latest Bitcoin block height from https://www.blockchain.info

data_sources.name: BlockCypher Bitcoin Block Hash
data_sources.description: Retrives Bitcoin block hash at a given block height from https://blockcypher.com

data_sources.name: CoinGecko Cryptocurrency Trading Volume
data_sources.description: Retrieves current trading volume of a cryptocurrency from https://www.coingecko.com

data_sources.name: CryptoCompare Cryptocurrency Trading Volume
data_sources.description: Retrieves current trading volume of a cryptocurrency from https://www.cryptocompare.com

data_sources.name: ETH Gas Station Current Ethereum Gas Price
data_sources.description: Retrieves current Ethereum gas price from https://ethgasstation.info

data_sources.name: Quantum Random Number Generator
data_sources.description: Retrieves array of random number from https://qrng.anu.edu.au

data_sources.name: Yahoo Finance Stock Price
data_sources.description: Retrieves current price of a stock from https://finance.yahoo.com

oracle_scripts.name: Cryptocurrency Price in USD
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the average cryptocurrency price using current price data from CoinGecko, CryptoCompare, and Binance

oracle_scripts.name: Gold Price in ATOMs
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries current average gold price in ATOMs using gold price data from FreeForexAPI and ATOM price from Binance

oracle_scripts.name: Stock Price (Alpha Vantage)
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the current price of a stock from Alpha Vantage

oracle_scripts.name: Latest Bitcoin Block Count
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the latest Bitcoin block height from Blockchain.info

oracle_scripts.name: Bitcoin Block Hash
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the Bitcoin block hash at the given block height from BlockCypher

oracle_scripts.name: CoinGecko Cryptocurrency Volume
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries a cryptocurrency's average trading volume for the past day from Coingecko

oracle_scripts.name: CryptoCompare Cryptocurrency Volume
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries a cryptocurrency's average trading volume for the past day from CryptoCompare

oracle_scripts.name: Ethereum Gas Price
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the current Ethereum gas price from ETH gas station

oracle_scripts.name: Open Sky Network
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script for checking whether a given flight number exists during the given time period from OpenSky Network

oracle_scripts.name: Open Weather Map
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the current weather data of a location from OpenWeatherMap

oracle_scripts.name: Quantum Random Number Generator
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries a large random number from  Australia's National University Quantum Random API.

oracle_scripts.name: Yahoo Stock Price
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the current price of a stock from Yahoo Finance

oracle_scripts.name: Fair Cryptocurrency Market Price
oracle_scripts.description: Oracle script that queries the current price of a cryptocurrency from CoinGecko, CryptoCompare, and Binance and aggregates them using the user-selected method in the selected  base currency
